title: Laugh for Today: Colin Berry’s Latest Idea
post:
This is colin Berry’s latest and best idea.
More seriously, COMSOL is just a tool, a physicist’s work is to build the right model, and in that sense there is definitely more physics in Rogers’ work than Fanti’s.
author: anoxie

title: Laugh for Today: Colin Berry’s Latest Idea
post: Although Collin is playing true to form in his usual vein of mockery, a more tasteful brand of humour would be no bad thing to see more of on this blog-site.  It would make a welcome change from the unduly prolix verbosity of self-importance and carping that we too frequently see here.
author: daveb of wellington nz
